professionalism.title: 100% professionalism
professionalism.description: I am committed to offering you a service of quality and exceptional professionalism, in the creation of your website. I am here to provide you with a web design and functionality experience, fast, precise, and adapted to all your needs.

advice.title: I advise you to choose the best option for your company
advice.description: I am here to help you find the best solution for your project. If you need guidance on the best available options, I will be happy to offer you my best option for you and your work, the same if you already have a website and want to adapt a new design or functionality.

devices.title: Your website on any device
devices.description: I work diligently to ensure that each element of your website is perfectly optimized and adaptable to different screen sizes. Nowadays, we navigate everything towards mobile devices, so it is important to dedicate a part of the development to responsive design.

skills.markupLanguage: Deep domain of markup language, allowing me to create and structure content clearly and concisely.
skills.webInterfaceDesign: I create and design web interfaces with style and elegance, without forgetting responsiveness on all devices.
skills.javascriptKnowledge: Solid knowledge of the main functionalities of Javascript, and I continue to learn continuously.
skills.reactExperience: I have been perfecting my skills in React for several months now, this very page is built in React.
skills.databaseExperience: My experience covers fundamental aspects such as creating databases and collections, designing basic queries, and document manipulation.
skills.bootstrapKnowledge: Good knowledge of Bootstrap, I often use it in various projects.
skills.dailyUsage: In my daily life, I cannot do without Git, it has accompanied me throughout this adventure, 100% of my time.
skills.gitExperience: Like Github, Git has always been in my learning course, studying has been daily.
skills.tailwindExperience: I have worked diligently with Tailwind, which has provided me with a deep and balanced mastery of this framework.
skills.angularExperience: My experience with Angular has led me to explore the latest versions, creating projects in Angular 17 and 18. I stay up to date with the new features in Angular 19.
skills.leafletExperience: With Leaflet, I have learned to integrate interactive maps in React and Angular applications. I have worked with features like custom markers, layers, and real-time video streaming. This experience has allowed me to dive deeper into the integration of lightweight maps with dynamic data, enhancing user interaction and experience.
skills.maplibreExperience: With Maplibre, I have gained skills to visualize large datasets on dynamic vector maps. I have learned to work with clusters to group points by categories, customize map styles, and manage complex open-source data. This experience has helped me better understand how to organize and present geospatial information effectively and attractively.
skills.openlayersExperience: With OpenLayers, I have learned to implement advanced features for managing geospatial data. I have developed tools to add points with descriptions, draw lines, polygons, and circles, and enable search by descriptions. I have also gained knowledge to generate, export, and import GeoJSON files, deepening my understanding of data manipulation and its interoperability in GIS applications.
skills.mapboxExperience: With Mapbox, I have learned to develop interactive map visualizers to display dynamic geospatial data. I have gained skills in integrating custom maps, managing data by date and location, and visualizing the water levels of the dams in Catalonia through dynamic layers, improving user interaction with geospatial information.
skills.primeNgExperience: I have worked with PrimeNG to integrate rich and interactive UI components into my applications. I have used several components such as tables, forms, menus, and search bars to improve user experience and development efficiency.
skills.primeReactExperience: I have worked with PrimeReact to integrate advanced UI components into my React applications. I have used several components like tables, forms, calendars, and charts to improve functionality and user experience, facilitating the development of modern and efficient interfaces.

projects.title: Traffic Valéncia
projects.description: Traffic Valéncia is a website developed with JS that geolocates all the traffic cameras in the metropolitan area of Valencia. Users can check live streams from the cameras, providing a practical and visual tool to monitor traffic conditions in the city.
projects.description1: Traffic Valéncia uses data provided by the open data portal of the City Council of Valencia. It also incorporates a lightweight library 'leaflet-control-geocoder', allowing users to geolocate specific destinations in a simple and intuitive way. It is designed with Tailwind CSS, ensuring a modern style with an attractive visual experience, focusing on mobile-first.

projects.title: Mexico Guide
projects.description: Mexico Guide is a website developed with JS, an interactive guide that allows geolocation of Mexico's most important tourist destinations, Maya treasures, archaeological sites, and UNESCO World Heritage locations, all displayed with geolocation markers (colored clusters) for a clear user experience.
projects.description1: Each geolocation includes a description and a small gallery of photos of the place, developed with Google APIs. The geolocation data is provided by the Institute of Geography of UNAM (Mexico), from the IDEA platform.

projects.title: Cleopatra Cosmétics
projects.description: Cleopatra Cosmétics is an e-commerce website developed with React, specializing in luxury cosmetic products. The clean and simple design allows users to clearly view the main features, guiding customers through the different purchase processes. The checkout process is ready to be connected to a database, and the physical store is geolocated using React Leaflet.

projects.title: Harry Potter App
projects.description: Harry Potter is a website developed with Angular 17, where you can find all the information about Harry Potter. The data is collected from the HP-API, allowing the rendering of the main characters, professors, students, and all spells related to the Harry Potter Universe.

projects.title: SpaceAirTracker
projects.description: SpaceAirTracker is a website developed with Angular 17 and the OpenLayers library. It is a tracker for national and international flights, allowing users to geolocate the flight and know its speed, ICAO, latitude, and country of origin. It also allows tracking flights based on the city of origin. Its clean and functional style is designed with Bootstrap.

projects.title: Claustrum Aqvae
projects.description: Claustrum Aqvae is developed with Angular 17. It is a website that measures the status of the dams in Catalonia. For the interactive map and animations, I have used the Mapbox library combined with the Mapbox Places API to geolocate all the dams in the Catalonia region. It allows searching by day for any dam and provides the measurement data of the selected dam.
projects.description1: For the design, I have used the Tailwind library. To display the data, I have used the 'Dades Obertes de Catalunya' portal.

projects.title: The Holy Wine
projects.description: The Holy Wine is developed with the latest version of Angular, Angular 19, utilizing the latest features in the framework's directives. For the design, I have used Angular Material and Tailwind CSS.
projects.description1: You can search by wine or location, with over 10,000 entries. It includes a section explaining different grape varieties in the database and allows users to learn about some of the exclusive wine tasters by scanning the QR code attached to the cards.

projects.title: ThunderAI
projects.description: ThunderAI is developed with JS, Vite, and Tailwind. Using the artificial intelligence models provided by the Hugging Face platform, I have utilized the latest DeepSeek R3 model.
projects.description1: You can ask it anything in any language or complexity. The interface is clean and modern.

projects.title: Bitácora Map
projects.description: Bitácora Map is developed with Angular 17, OpenLayers, and Bootstrap. It is the perfect tool to complement your travels and share information with whoever you want. It allows you to add markers, draw polygons and lines, add comments, and edit them easily. Additionally, data can be saved in LocalStorage for access at any time.
projects.description1: It offers the ability to download and upload GeoJSON files.

sobreMi.intro: Enter prompts, to view the message via the terminal
sobreMi.quienSoy: My name is Andrea, and I am from Girona. I’ve been developing websites for over a year and a half in the Frontend sector. My favorite frameworks are Angular and React.
sobreMi.unMundoDescubierto: Since I discovered this world, about a year ago, I’ve dived into this exciting journey of constant learning and personal growth, and I’ve learned that nothing is impossible to achieve if you work hard and with discipline.
sobreMi.viajeLenguajes: During this journey, I’ve gained experience in Frontend Web development and my first steps in Backend, using the most in-demand technologies in this career: HTML, CSS, Javascript, React, Node, MongoDb.
sobreMi.gracias: If you've come this far, I wanted to thank you for taking your time to get to know me a little more. If you have any questions or want to know more about me, don't hesitate to contact me. Thank you!

Contact.you wants: Do you want advice, guidance, or do you want to share your idea for your website? Get in touch with me.
Contact.name: Name
Contact.you want: What would you like to ask me?
